taskGroups.title: Surveys
taskGroups.detail: This task group includes examples of surveys that are currently supported by the ResearchUI framework.

tasks.title: List UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `list` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `list` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchUI framework.

tasks.title: Picker UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `picker` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `picker` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchUI framework.

tasks.title: Textfield UI hint examples
tasks.subtitle: Questions that use the `textfield` uiHint
tasks.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of RSDInputField objects that use the `textfield` RSDFormUIHint that are currently supported by the ResearchUI framework.

tasks.title: Example Survey
tasks.detail: This is an example survey used to generate example JSON archives.

taskGroups.title: Recorders
taskGroups.detail: This task group includes examples of active tasks that include spoken instructions and recorders that are currently included in the Research and ResearchUI frameworks.

tasks.title: Distance Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording relative GPS location.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording GPS distance data using the RSDDistanceRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

tasks.title: Motion Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording motion sensor data.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording motion sensor data using the RSDMotionRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

taskGroups.title: UI Themes
taskGroups.detail: This task group includes examples the UI/UX Design System.

tasks.title: Color Mapping
tasks.subtitle: This example shows the color rules used by the Design System.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for how to set up an activity that expressly defines the colors used for each view.

tasks.title: Images
tasks.subtitle: This example shows examples of image themes used by the Design System.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for how to set up an activity that uses static and animating images for assorted instruction views.
